Description: Dulles Green features spacious one, two, and three-bedroom homes with upscale features, such as attached garages, cathedral ceilings, and lofts. These garden-style apartment residences are also close to some of the best dining, entertainment, and shopping attractions in the area. Shopping enthusiasts will love living near a variety of retail centers and malls. Reston Town Center is an outdoor shopping center with a diverse blend of stores, including Talbots, Athleta, Gap, and Anthropologie. At Dulles Town Center, you will find popular department stores such JCPenney, Macy's, and Nordstrom in an indoor mall setting. For groceries and household essentials, both Fresh World and Safeway are nearby as well. This area also includes plenty of entertainment and dining attractions close by. Description: The Mark at Dulles Station is a sophisticated community located in the Dulles Tech Corridor. Its Exit 10 location off the Dulles Toll Road is only 5 miles from Reston Town Center, which boasts 50 retail shops, 30 restaurants and a multi-screen cinema. The local bus station, the Fairfax Connector, is within walking distance of the community, and it travels straight to the Metro, which offers a 30-minute ride into DC.Its proximity to major Dulles area attractions, such as Dulles Town Center, Reston Town Center, Tysons Corner, Fairfax and Loudoun County make it an ideal community for working professionals. Just 2 miles away is the Herndon-Monroe Park and Ride, which takes you to the West Falls Church Metro station. The Mark at Dulles Station is also close to major roadways I-495, I-66, Route 267, and Route 28. It is also only 3 miles from Washington Dulles International Airport.

Description: Ashford Meadows is located in prestigious Herndon, Virginia and conveniently located in close proximity to Washington, DC. With easy access to major roadways, shops, and restaurants, you will find one of our spacious apartments to be the home of your dreams! Stop by our elegant clubhouse to experience the lifestyle that awaits you. Our professional staff will provide you with exemplary customer service and welcome you to your new home! * Ashford Meadows Apartments * The city of Herndon, located in Northern Virginia, is a populous area in the state that is conveniently located within commuting distance of Washington, D.C. Herndon is a wealthy and thriving community with a lot to offer in the way of bars, restaurants and local entertainment venues. The Clock Tower Plaza houses a number of businesses, like a grocery store, restaurants, pubs and a gym. Favorite places to frequent include Breakers Billiards, which features darts and over a dozen pool tables. Ned Devine's Irish Pub and Restaurant, located next to Breakers, is another hot spot for its live entertainment and friendly atmosphere. Gold's Gym and Shoppers are conveniently located in the plaza as well. Employment is high in the region in large part because of the city's proximity to Washington, D.C. Many government contractors set up shop in Herndon to take advantage of the location's lower cost of living and proximity to the capital. * Apartments for rent in Herndon, VA 20171 are both affordable and filled with luxuries that you would expect from a community that lives and works so close to the nation's capital. * Ashford Meadows Apartments offers luxury apartments at a reasonable cost for those seeking an easy commute to work in the Northern Virginia, Maryland, and Washington, D.C. area. * Apartment amenities include a washer and dryer in each unit, a frost-free refrigerator, ice maker, gas cooking, ceiling fans, private patio or balcony, dishwasher, fireplace and an optional loft. Short-term leases are also available. The apartment community also offers cable/satellite TV, accommodation for pets of all sizes, a playground, business center car wash area, and storage units available for rent. Open parking and garages are also available. Ashford Meadows Apartments offers its own state-of-the-art fitness center and clubhouse for entertaining. * Do you feel like staying local this weekend? Invite a few friends over to enjoy the swimming pool or play a game on the sand volleyball court. * Apartments

Description: Live life your way at Kendrick Court. This cozy and affordable independent retirement community in the heart of Herndon is available to individuals 62+ looking for a remarkable place to call home. Our exceptional staff plans social activities all year long and are dedicated to helping you live better. Kendrick Court's wide-ranging amenities include a library, communal activity room, fitness center, and arts and crafts room, allowing you to truly relax and enjoy every moment you choose to spend at home. Outside your door, Kendrick Court is your gateway to all that the greater Dulles and Northern Virginia area has to offer, with extensive shopping and dining options just minutes away. Camaraderie, convenience, and comfort-it's all part of everyday life when you make Kendrick Court at McNair Farms your home.

Description:
LUXURY and GARDEN Style Condo with indoor PARKING GARAGE + Guest Parking
* Wonderful Open and Spacious floor plan condo at The Bryson at Woodland Park.
* Upscale neighborhood is minutes walk to Herndon Monroe Park and Ride. 
* Woodland Park Crossing shopping complex complete with Harris Teeter, Chevy Chase Bank, 
Starbucks, multiple eateries, pediatrics, dentistry, yoga, salon, dry cleaners and day spa.
* Across from Fairfax County Parkway and only two blocks from Herndon Monroe Park & Ride.
* Easy access to Dulles Airport, 7100/Fairfax County Parkway and 267 toll road.
NOTE: METRO IS COMING in 2018. Proposed stop will be just down the street on Monroe.
Right now there is convenient bus service to connect you to Metro for easy commuting.
FEATURES Include:
* Gourmet kitchen includes GE Profile STAINLESS STEEL appliances 
* 42' cabinetry, Microwave, Granite Counter Tops
* Upgraded ceramic tile and Spacious kitchen
* Walk-In carpeted Closet and 2 ceiling fans
* Large bathroom with garden style Tub/Shower
* Full size in unit Washer and Dryer
PARKING SPACE:
* One Assigned indoor garaged parking + Guest parking, and Spacious Patio overlooking courtyard.
AMENITIES Include:
* Gated community with 24 hour security patrol 
* Professional business center, Club House and Meeting Room
* 24 hour Athletic Fitness Center, Snow and Trash Removal
* 2 Beautiful sparkling pools with sundeck, locker room, one Hot Tub, and 4 BBQ Grills
* Multi-media entertainment lounge party room with Gaming area with full-sized billiards table
* Pre-wired for all multimedia needs, including high-speed internet access and cable TV.
LEASE Terms:
* Rent Include: A Reserved Garage Parking, Condo fee, Sewer, and Garbage Collection
* Lease Length: 12 Month(s), Rent is $1400 Plus $1400 Security Deposit 
* Tenant is responsible for Gas, Electric, Water and Renter's insurance. 
* Rental application, Employment Verification/proof of income, credit report (good credit history) and 
Background check required, $35 credit check fee per applicant will apply. 
* Type of Housing: Unfurnished Apartments, Condo/Duplex. Available October 20, 2017.
* Small pets maybe considered with an additional pet deposit and Non Smokers!!!
Please Call/Text 703-431-7200 or Email to schedule an appointment for showing.

Pet Policy: Dogs and Cats Allowed

Description:
I am looking for someone to take over my lease on my current apartment. You can see the official posting for the complex here: https://www.apartments.com/ashton-at-dulles-corner-herndon-va/sg6s7q6/, the apartment is the Serendipity with 1147 sq/ft. 
This is not a private sublease, everything will go through the leasing office to protect both parties. 
The lease ends April 14th. 
I will reimburse the application ($50) and admin fee ($150) when we sign over the lease. 
The rent for this apartment is normally $1,715, however, I will give a signing perk of $1,200 when the lease is signed to offset the cost and make the rent $1,515. 
I have also paid a $250 security deposit that you will be free to keep at the end of the lease. You are responsible for any additional security deposit fee due to your credit or background check. 
I have already paid October's rent. You can move in as early as Oct 14th. 
It is a beautiful apartment, and I am sad to leave it but I must move for work. 
It is a one bedroom, one bath with a loft. Two story living room, gorgeous view, quiet top floor apartment.
I do not smoke, however the complex does allow people to smoke if they wish. The apartment is smoke free at the moment.

Pet Policy: Dogs Allowed

Description:
2-Level Townhouse Style Condo in Great Community - excellent amenities. Well maintained. Excellent open floor plan with sliding glass door out to balcony. Wall-to-wall carpet. NO GARAGE. 
Amenities: pool, fitness ctr., clubhouse, picnic/BBQ area, playground. Convenient to Reston Town Center, new Wiehle-Reston Metro, and Dulles Airport.
APPLY ONLINE: https://arlingtonrealty.appfolio.com/listings/detail/87e352eb-c5cf-4629-9b9a-6a2129a39b03.

Description: BERKDALE APARTMENTS, located in Herndon Virginia, is one of Northern Virginia's popular locations featuring easy shopping, great dining and entertainment at Worldgate Centre (3 blocks) and Old Town Herndon minutes away as well as Reston Town Center nearby. Plus, you are just minutes from the Dulles Toll Road, Dulles Greenway, Herndon Parkway and Route 28/ (V-267) for quick access to transportation routes east toward DC and west toward Dulles International Airport as well as Loudoun County. In addition to our great location, you'll love our beautifully designed apartment homes with great features such as, spacious living/dining rooms, modern kitchens, walk-in closets, and included utilities (gas only). Enjoy park-like views from sundrenched windows! At Berkdale Apartments you can take a leisurely stroll to the Alabama Drive Park (a Fairfax County Park) next door, enjoy the community playground with your family and put your cooking skills to work at our grilling areas. Commuter bus at door. Pool & tennis.

Description: Rent this beautiful end unit townhouse w lots of windows. Fabulous open plan on the main lvl w gorgeous hardwood floors. Wonderful breakfast area next to the kitchen overlooking the deck & trees in the back. Large master suite w 2 closets. Enclosed Rec room with gas fireplace & full bath can be a 4th bedroom. Bonus storage areas. Great location within 5 miles from Dulles airport & close to Rt 28.

Description:
(571) 386-1075 - - First time offered for lease*Great Corner space with 2 bedrooms and 2 bath* Open floor plan*Garage parking and a private balcony that backs to trees*Updated with tile and hardwood floors and countertops* Super convenient location for shops, walks and commuter spot! Professionally Managed Property by Pearson Smith Property Management! Call today to tour. elevator !
Paved walking trail that runs throughout the community, Worldgate Centre, is located near by with state-of-the-art theatre, dozens of restaurants and an exciting array of shops and services. The center also includes a health club with a day spa. Worldgate Condominium is also conveniently located near many parks, the WO&D trail and just blocks away from the future Silver Line Metro at Monroe Station
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE3531265) Pet policies - No Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed.

Description:
(571) 291-2165 - Enjoy the luxury of this 3 bedroom, 2 bath renovated townhouse-styled condo. - Kitchen complete with stainless steel appliances, granite countertops and raised panel oak cabinets. Featuring 9’ ceilings and crown molding throughout, lovely gas fireplace in the living room, walk-in closets, washer and dryer and don’t forget the garage! Great onsite clubhouse with fireside lounge, pool with deck and fully equipped 24-hour fitness center, all located conveniently close to the Toll Road and Fairfax County Parkway! NO smoking. Pets will be considered on a case-by-case basis. LB Application & LB Lease required.
(RLNE3449111) Other Amenities - Other- stainless steel appliances, community clubhouse, community gym, gas-fireplace, Pool, Garage.

BIG master suite w/tray ceiling & true walk-in closet + its own balcony. 2 Blocks to old-town Herndon & W&OD Trail. No smokers.

Description:
2105 Highcourt Lane #401, Herndon VA 20170
.
Available is this two bedroom, two bath condo in highly desired Worldgate of Herndon. Worldgate is famous for its amenities and fitness center.
.
This top floor home boasts of great features such as wood floors, fireplace, 10 foot ceilings, sliding door to private balcony, Spacious master w/ 2 closets & private bath, 2nd bedroom is large with ample storage, assigned parking, and so much more!
.
Walking distance to shopping, dining & entertainment. Minutes to Rt 267, Reston Town Center & Monroe St. Park & Ride. Worldgate Condominium is located in The Town of Herndon in Northern Virginia across 17 ½ professionally landscaped acres. 2 Community Pools * Fitness Center * On Site Staff Amenities include swimming pool and exercise room. 
.
Complimentary Wi-Fi Clubroom available to all Residents, 24 hour access to the association's Exercise Room. Paved walking trail that runs throughout, including Virginia's premier entertainment destination with state-of-the-art theater, dozens of restaurants and an exciting array of shops and services. 
.
The center also includes a health club with a day spa. Worldgate Condominium is also conveniently located near many parks, the WO&D trail and just blocks away from the future Silver Line Metro at Monroe Station. 
.
Pets Accepted on case by case basis.
.
Presented by TMKenny Property Services. Easy, secure, online application and rent payments. See our reviews on Yelp, Google, Angie's List, and Thumbtack!! EOH

Description:
(571) 291-2165 - Superb 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath, 1 car garage townhome backing trees in McNair Farms! - 3 finished levels include a large kitchen with maple cabinets, family room with gas fireplace surrounded by custom-built oak shelves/entertainment center. Hardwood floors in the kitchen and family room, with ceramic tile in the foyer. Charming master suite features vaulted ceiling and great closet space complete with lots of built-in storage. Deck over looks lovely landscaping, and walkout lower level comes complete with nice patio. Don’t miss the stunning stained glass about the front door! NO smoking. A pet will be considered on a case-by-case basis. LB Application & LB Lease required.
(RLNE3318442) Other Amenities - Other- gas-fireplace, Patio.

Description: International Apartments is a 90 unit apartment building located at 831 Locust Street, in Herndon, Virginia. Nearby you will find Giant Food, Mom's Organic Market, Safeway, CVS, and much more! The building features very spacious 1, 2, and 3 bedroom apartments with beautiful hardwood floors. All utilities are included for FREE! Plus each apartment includes 1 FREE storage unit & 1 FREE parking space! No pets allowed, except service animals at no extra charge. *Rental prices and specials are subject to change.
